thread.title: Community Catalysts of California Welcomes New Board Members

author: cnbc.com
title: Community Catalysts of California Welcomes New Board Members

organizations.name: community catalysts of california welcomes new board

text:
SAN DIEGO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Community Catalysts of California Board of Directors Chair, James Wheeler, welcomed three new Board Members at CCC’s Annual Meeting on January 24 th :
Melissah Walker, Director of Human Resources at Rhino Linings Corporation. ( http://www.rhinolinings.com )
Jarrod Hammes, Senior Manager at ecoATM. ( http://www.ecoatm.com )
Zeyad Moussa, President & CEO at Ginger Shots. ( https://gingershots.com )
Wheeler noted, “Each of these individuals brings to our Leadership their experience in business and a passion for helping people achieve success. Our organization and those that we serve will benefit from the volunteer efforts of these new Directors.”
More:
Community Catalysts of California, founded in 1983, is a nonprofit 501(c)(3), charitable organization that provides vocational counseling, job placement, community-living skills training, residential support, in-home care, crisis intervention and other services to individuals and their families throughout California.
Various private, federal, state, and local agencies as well as generous donors in the community support us.
Our goal is to empower individuals and their families to live and work successfully in their communities.
For more information about Community Catalysts, please visit our website, http://communitycatalystscalifornia.org/ or call 858-292-2020.
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180206006071/en/
